Semaphore Documentation

Version information

Builds on Semaphore run on Ubuntu 12.04 Precise LTS. The following Ruby versions are available via rbenv:

  • 2.0.0-p0
  • 1.9.3-p374 (p327 is also available)
  • 1.9.2-p320
  • ree-1.8.7-2012.02
  • JRuby 1.7.3
  • Bundler 1.3.0

System packages installed by default include:

Name Version
chromedriver 23.0.1240
Elasticsearch 0.20.2
Firefox 19.0
libqtwebkit4 2.2.1
imagemagick 6.6.9.7
Java (openjdk) 7u13-2.3.7
Linux kernel 3.2.0-35
memcached 1.4.13
MongoDB 2.2.2
MySQL 5.5.29
Node.js 0.8.21
PhantomJS 1.8.1
PostgreSQL 9.1.7
Redis 2.6.10
Sphinx 2.0.4
sqlite 3.7.9
wkhtmltopdf 0.9.6

Note: this is a partial list. Upgrades and additional packages can be installed with apt-get commands either from Ubuntu’s official distribution channels or PPAs.
